attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is absouloutly discusting how hard working people such as myself and family and many more, work full-time. and people who decide to be lazy and can't be assed to work! sit back and get benefits rent paid for etc! plus young  woman or s hould isay girls at 15-18 having babies get a nice cosy free flat and benefits! it's not on! yet we pay tax for them!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
